description: This file defines a React component for the dashboard page of a web application. It imports various chart components and uses them to visualize data like trends, sentiments, sources, and recent reviews. It also fetches data from an API hook and accesses app state via a store.

methods.name: DashboardPage
methods.description: Main React component for rendering the dashboard page, including various charts and recent reviews.

methods.name: Card
methods.description: A small reusable component to display a title and corresponding value inside the dashboard.
